Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.beans

Class MockModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.beans.MockModel
public class MockModel
extends java.lang.Object
Local copy of the game model.

      public MockPlayer getLocalPlayer()
      Gets the MockPlayer that is playing with this instance of the client.
      Returns:
      the local player, if it has not been set yet returns null

    • setLocalPlayer

      Sets the MockPlayer that is playing with this instance of the client.
      Parameters:

    • getPlayer

      public MockPlayer getPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the MockPlayer with the given name, if not found returns null.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player to search for
      Returns:
      the player with the given name if found, null otherwise

    • addPlayer

      public MockPlayer addPlayer​(java.lang.String name, boolean localPlayer)
      Creates a new MockPlayer and adds it to the player map, if a player with this name is already present returns it instead.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      localPlayer - if this player should be set as the local player
      Returns:
      the new player added or the existing one with this name if found

    • getDevelopmentDeck

      Sets the deck made up of development cards.
      Parameters:
      developmentDeck - a stack representing the deck made up of development cards, each stack initially has 3 cards
